detail_desc: Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with frill trims. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt in woven fabric with a scalloped edge and broderie anglaise at the hem. Jersey-lined skirt.
Fine-knit shaftless socks with a silicone trim around the heel to hold them in place.
Oversized, double-breasted jacket in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and diagonal front pockets. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.

Tuxedo trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, jetted back pockets and legs with satin side stripes. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Long dress in mesh with an embroidered pattern, a small frilled collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt with a flounced hem. Half-lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, sturdy denim. Slim fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. The cotton and polyester content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Double-layered hat in soft cotton jersey.
Cardigan in soft, patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Waist-high thong briefs in ribbed jersey with a V-shaped waist, narrow sides and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in light sweatshirt fabric with a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in an airy organic cotton weave with a yoke, short, frilled sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Knee-length skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, coin pocket, front and back pockets and slit at the back.
Scarf in a soft cable knit with tassels on the short sides. Size 33x170 cm.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Diagonal front pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets, a hammer loop and a leg pocket.

prod_name: Julius WP Winterboot SB SC ASQ
detail_desc: Waterproof, warm-lined boots in fabric with imitation leather and grosgrain details. Padded shaft with an imitation leather appliqué, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Leggings in superstretch, flexible denim with appliqués. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. The cotton content of the leggings is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in washed-look sweatshirt fabric with raw edges, a hood and patch front pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.
Braided, adjustable bracelets in various colours. Circumference 18-38 cm.
Elasticated scrunchies in soft, fluffy faux fur.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Set with two T-shirts and two pairs of shorts in soft, printed, organic cotton jersey. T-shirts with narrow trims around the neckline and a press-stud on each shoulder. Shorts with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft, patterned jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim at the top. Double layer at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif front and back.
Short shorts in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tassel-trimmed hems.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves.
Short dress in woven fabric with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, short, wide sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in a jacquard weave with narrow notch lapels and a fastening with two buttons down the front. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. For the matching trousers, search on 0575442.

Knitted jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Soft, thermal fleece inside. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Top in a viscose weave with a slight sheen, with a draped neckline and adjustable spaghetti straps.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with an opening at the top with a tie detail at the neck and a seam down the front.

Shaping. Jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the hips, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Straight-cut shirt in soft cotton poplin with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cigarette trousers in a viscose weave with a regular waist with that is elasticated at the back, side pockets and tapered legs with grosgrain side stripes.
Jumper in a soft knit. Relaxed fit with long, raglan balloon sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton velvet with buttons at the back, a seam at the hips with a small frill trim, and a skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. Organic cotton lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a shimmering motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft slub knit with a brushed finish. Deep V-neck with a raw-edge lace trim, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend with a shawl collar, off-centre zip down the front and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
Shorts in an airy, patterned viscose weave with pleats at the front for added volume, elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, buttons on the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Waterproof hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slip-on suede shoes with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.

Dress in patterned, lightweight twill with flounces down the front that continue over the back and buttons at the back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with a V-neck front and back.
Short dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Knee-length dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft, fast-drying mesh jersey with a racer back.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Made using Lycra® Beauty technology to retain the shape of the jeans and provide a sculpting effect with optimal comfort.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Suit trousers woven in a soft Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist, zip fly, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, a drawstring at the waist, handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets. Single back vent. Pile lining at the top, quilted lining below.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping, pleated satin with a visible, elasticated, ribbed waistband. Lined.
Short shorts in sturdy cotton jersey with a high, paper bag waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt.
Short dress in cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and short cap sleeves. Unlined.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases and decorative plastic studs down the sides.
Short A-line skirt in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button and large patch front pockets. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Waist bag in nylon with a zip at the top and a small, zipped outer compartment. Adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Size 8x14x26 cm.
